languages.text: "Смею напомнить, Лорд-капитан, что никто, кроме вас, о свойствах данного минерала не осведомлен. Если оставить его здесь, никто об этом не узнает".
"Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."
languages.original_text: "Смею напомнить, Лорд-капитан, что никто, кроме вас, о свойствах данного минерала не осведомлен. Если оставить его здесь, никто об этом не узнает".

traits.locale_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you is knowledgeable of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."
"Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you is knowledgeable of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."
"Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."
"Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."
"Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."
"Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

languages.text: “请允许我提醒您，舰长大人，除您之外，没有任何人知道这种矿物的特性。就算把它留在这里，也没有人会发现。”
languages.original_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我提醒您，舰长大人，除您之外，没有任何人知道这种矿物的特性。就算把它留在这里，也没有人会发现。”

languages.text: 「あえて、申し上げるが、ロード・キャプテン、あなたのそばにはこの鉱物の特性の知識を持つものが誰もいないではありませんか？ここに残していけば、だれもわからないと思います」
languages.original_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

traits.locale_text: 「あえて、申し上げるが、ロード・キャプテン、あなたのそばにはこの鉱物の特性の知識を持つものが誰もいないではありませんか？ここに残していけば、だれもわからないと思います」

languages.text: «¿Necesito recordarle, Lord Capitán, que nadie aparte de usted está al corriente de las propiedades de este mineral? Si lo dejásemos aquí, nadie se enteraría de nada».
languages.original_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

traits.locale_text: «¿Necesito recordarle, Lord Capitán, que nadie aparte de usted está al corriente de las propiedades de este mineral? Si lo dejásemos aquí, nadie se enteraría de nada».

languages.text: "Hatırlatmama gerek var mı Lord Kaptan? Bu madenin özelliklerini sizden başka kimse bilmiyor. Burada bırakırsak kimsecikler öğrenemez."
languages.original_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

traits.locale_text: "Hatırlatmama gerek var mı Lord Kaptan? Bu madenin özelliklerini sizden başka kimse bilmiyor. Burada bırakırsak kimsecikler öğrenemez."

languages.text: « Oserais-je vous rappeler que personne à part vous ne sait quoi que ce soit des propriétés de ce minerai, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Si nous le laissons ici, nul ne les découvrira. »
languages.original_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

traits.locale_text: « Oserais-je vous rappeler que personne à part vous ne sait quoi que ce soit des propriétés de ce minerai, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Si nous le laissons ici, nul ne les découvrira. »

languages.text: "Darf ich Euch daran erinnern, Lord Captain, dass niemand außer Euch die Eigenschaften dieses Minerals kennt? Wenn es hier zurückbleibt, wird niemand davon erfahren."
languages.original_text: "Dare I remind you, Lord Captain, that no one besides you has any knowledge of this mineral's properties? If it is left here, no one will find out."

traits.locale_text: "Darf ich Euch daran erinnern, Lord Captain, dass niemand außer Euch die Eigenschaften dieses Minerals kennt? Wenn es hier zurückbleibt, wird niemand davon erfahren."
